cards.title: NightMare

cards.title: Bring Another
body: Whenever {NightMare} destroys a target, she may deal 1 target 2 Melee damage. Discard the top card of your deck.

activatableAbilities.name: discard
activatableAbilities.text: Reveal the top card of the villain deck. If it is a target, put it into play and increase the next damage {NightMare} deals it by 3. Otherwise, discard it.

cards.title: Cowabunga it is!
body: {NightMare} deals up to 3 targets 2 Melee damage each.

activatableAbilities.name: discard
activatableAbilities.text: Select a card from your trash and discard it.

cards.title: Dynamic Entry
body: Destroy an environment card.

cards.title: Hold Yer Horses
body: Reduce damage taken by {NightMare} by 1.
When any damage is redirected to {NightMare}, reduce it by 1.
powers: {NightMare} deals 1 target 3 Melee damage. Reduce the next damage dealt by targets dealt damage this way by the damage they take.

cards.title: Hoof Loose
body: When this card enters play, draw 2 cards.
If {NightMare} would be dealt 3 or more Damage from a single source, reduce it by 3, then destroy this card.

cards.title: Hoof Stomp

activatableAbilities.name: discard

body: When this card enters play, {NightMare} deals 1 target 1 Melee damage.

activatableAbilities.name: discard

cards.title: Kelpie Magic

powers: Draw 1 card. Discard 1 card. Play 1 card.

activatableAbilities.name: discard
